fabricTailorAdvert: If you want more skin options for Taterzens, install FabricTailor mod.
skinCommandUsage: To customize the skin even more, use FabricTailor's built in /skin command.
taterzenMessages: Taterzen %s has the following messages. Click on one to edit it.
editMessageMode: You are now editing message: %s. Click enter after editing to save it.
enterMessageEditor: Click to enter message editing mode.
taterzenCommands: Taterzen %s will execute the following commands on right-click.
taterzenProfessions: Taterzen %s has the following professions set. Click on X to remove one.

success.resetEntityType: Entity type for %s was reset to default.
success.equipmentEditorEnter: You've entered equipment editor for %s. Enter same command to exit.
success.equipmentEditorDescLine1: Right click the Taterzen to equip it.
success.equipmentEditorDescLine2: To put armor in hand, use shift right click.
success.equipmentEditorDescLine4: Shift right click with empty hand to drop all equipment.
success.skinChanged: Skin of Taterzen was fetched from %s.
success.changedMovementTypeFollow: Taterzen following goal has been set to %s.
success.pathEditorEnter: You've entered path editor for %s. Enter same command to exit.
success.pathEditorDescLine1: Left click the blocks to add them to the path.
success.pathEditorDescLine2: Right click the blocks to remove them to the path.
success.msgEditorEnter: You've entered message editor for %s. Enter same command to exit.
success.msgEditorDescLine1: Send messages in chat and %s will repeat them.
success.msgEditorDescLine2: You can use normal text or tellraw structure (for colors).
success.messageDelaySet: Message delay for the selected message is now %s.
success.deselectedTaterzen: Your Taterzen selection has been cleared.
success.updatedPermissionLevel: Permission level for command execution is now set to %s.
success.skinLayersMirrored: Skin layers for %s were mirrored from you successfully.
success.behaviourSuggestion: You'd probably want to set invulnerability to false as well.
success.invulnerableStatus: Invulnerable status has been set to %s.
success.equipmentDropStatus: Equipment drops have been set to %s.
success.flagSet: Taterzen flag has been changed to %s.

error.selectTaterzen: You have to select Taterzen first.
error.noTaterzenFound: No Taterzens with id %s were found.
error.noPresetFound: No Taterzen preset with name %s was found.
error.invalidText: The text nbt you entered is invalid.
error.noMessageFound: No messages with id %s were found.
error.enterMessageEditorMode: You need to enter message editor mode to use this feature.
error.noCommandFound: No commands with id %s were found.
error.disguiseLibRequired: DisguiseLib mod is required for this action.
error.noProfessionFound: No professions with id %s were found.
error.cannotSetPermissionLevel: Permission level %s is higher than your permission level.
error.noTaterzenDetected: No Taterzen was detected in front of you.
